The colors were excellent,  and the texture was good, but I think I will look for something else.

This set of sweatpants is a great additional for any woman who likes to be sporty yet comfortable. My girl wears them around the house for lounging or right out of the shower, and they’re also great to wear while walking or taking a quick trip to the store. You get 3 pairs in a multitude of colors, so they match with stuff you already have. This set is a great way to add to your casual wear wardrobe.

These joggers are soft and comfy and the colors are lovely (just as pictured) I love the cuffed ankles! I regret sizing up, because these are true to fit, but thanks to the drawstring, I can adjust them. The ribbed fabric is attractive and as a jogger should be, these are super comfy. I am sure I will be wearing them quite a bit, probably more than I should. Casual, attractive, cool, soft, comfy ...what else can you ask for in a jogger? I will repurchase and my Mom already wants some!

Ordered these for lounging around the house and they are perfect! The material is super soft and with plenty of stretch, they're very comfortable and love the cinched ankle so they don't ride up under blankets.  I'm petite (5', 105lbs - ordered a small) and these are definitely oversized on me; they very much look like lounge/PJs which works for me, but something to keep in mind if you were hoping to wear this as true joggers.  Last two call outs, but not enough to deduct stars: - There is no drawstring, but the waistband stretches - The waistband is very wide and on someone with a short torso is slightly uncomfortable, but I fold it over and wear them around my hips with no issues

Be sure to look at the close-up photos; these seem like they'd be fairly normal sweatpants, but they're thinner than most and ribbed. So they're sewn fairly well but made out of fabric that would normally be used for shirts rather than pants. That said, they're quite comfortable and have big pockets so I do like them; I just expect them to show signs of wear after maybe 3-6 months of normal use.

The Women's Ribbed Lounge Jogger Cuff Sweatpants offer comfort and style, making them ideal for casual lounging, yoga sessions, and everyday wear. Here's a closer look at these versatile and practical sweatpants.  #### Key Features: - **Ribbed Design**: The ribbed texture adds a stylish touch to these sweatpants, elevating their appearance for casual outings or relaxing at home. - **Jogger Cuff**: Featuring jogger-style cuffs, these sweatpants provide a tapered fit around the ankles, ensuring comfort and ease of movement. - **Drawstring Waist**: The adjustable drawstring waist allows for a personalized fit, ensuring comfort and security during activities like yoga or lounging. - **Pockets**: Equipped with functional pockets, these sweatpants offer convenient storage for essentials like keys or a phone. - **Comfortable Fabric**: Made from a soft and breathable fabric blend, the sweatpants provide all-day comfort, making them suitable for extended wear. - **Versatile Use**: Ideal for various activities including lounging at home, running errands, or practicing yoga, offering flexibility in wearability.  #### Performance: The Women's Ribbed Lounge Jogger Cuff Sweatpants excel in comfort and functionality. The ribbed texture enhances their visual appeal while the jogger cuffs ensure a secure fit around the ankles. The drawstring waist allows for a customizable fit, accommodating different body shapes and preferences. The inclusion of pockets adds practicality, making it easy to carry essentials without needing an extra bag.  #### Pros: - Stylish ribbed design suitable for casual wear - Jogger cuff provides a tapered fit around the ankles - Adjustable drawstring waist for a personalized fit - Functional pockets for convenient storage - Soft and breathable fabric for all-day comfort - Versatile use for lounging, yoga, or daily activities  #### Cons: - Sizing may vary, so checking the size chart is recommended for the best fit - Limited color options may not suit all preferences - Fabric care instructions should be followed to maintain quality over time  In summary, the Women's Ribbed Lounge Jogger Cuff Sweatpants offer a blend of style, comfort, and functionality, making them a practical choice for various activities and settings. Whether relaxing at home or running errands, these sweatpants provide comfort and versatility, enhancing the everyday wardrobe with their practical design and comfortable fabric.
